Pico Geyer wrote:
> Say for example I want to create a
> new instance by called one of these static methods:
> 
> MyNetworkInterfaceImpl netInt = MyNetworkInterfaceImpl.getLocalHost();

You could use an AbstractFactory instead of the static methods.

Cheers, Ilja
